divs: Sighting DetailsI was out side of my house and i saw a cylinder like thing coming from east going west kind of a yellow color and then I went inside for a minute and went back outside and I saw this star like object coming trod my house very slow. It then stops in one place over my house and sat there so I called my daddy to see if he could see this to and he went outside on his deck and said that he could see it waddling in the air so then I called my brother who lives next door and he came over and saw the same thing that I was seeing to, he said that he saw a light to the lift of the star like thing and it was strobing getting bright and then going back dim like they where commutating with each other . Is star like object stayed over my house for about three hours then I went inside to fold some clothes then I went back out side and it was gone.
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Raleigh
There were no other sightings in Raleigh on or around May 19th 2008
Summary: I was out side of my house and i saw a cylinder like thing
